wikipedia_page.main: Douglas Edward Hopkins (23 December 1902 – 1992) was a cathedral organist, who served at Peterborough Cathedral and Canterbury Cathedral.

response: * 1965–1971 – Douglas Edward Hopkins, (formerly organist of Canterbury Cathedral)

link_mentions.page: List of musicians at English cathedrals
response: * 1927–46 Douglas Edward Hopkins  (subsequently Organist Peterborough Cathedral; later Organist Canterbury Cathedral)
* 1946 Douglas Edward Hopkins (later Organist of Canterbury Cathedral)
